author: mheathsmith
title: Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: Blockbuster £60million moves edges another step closer as Atletico Madrid star wants to be new David Beckham
text:
EFL Mad for it Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United: Blockbuster £60million moves edges another step closer as Atletico Madrid star wants to be new David Beckham 
Striker’s ‘image advisor’ claims he would the ideal fit at Old Trafford - and has his eye on Becks' iconic No 7 shirt By PHIL CADDEN
